scenario_text.value:
This is so awful. They haven’t done
anything wrong!

Is this...all my fault? Because I turned this
place into a hideout?
This isn’t your fault, Miu!
But I...I can’t stand to see this...

(Miu’s pretty shocked. I can understand where
she’s coming from, really I can...)

(But even if it hurts, crying won’t help do
anything about it.)
(What should I do at a time like this...?)
Scold her.
Cheer her up for now.
Scold her.

This isn’t on you, Miu. None of this is your
fault.
Still, this is no time to be crying!
T-Takuma?! How could you say that?!

Miu, Shakomon. Both of you know we can’t drag
our feet here, don’t you?!
Well... Yeah, that’s true...

To prevent more painful memories for our
friends, and to keep everyone safe...
We have to keep our wits about us!
For...our friends...

Yeah... Yeah, you’re right! Sorry, I see my
mistake now!

I can’t just sit here and cry. You hit the
nail on the head, Takuma.
A queen can’t act like this!
Cheer her up for now.

Don’t cry, Miu! No one thinks this is your
fault.

B-but I... I’m everyone’s queen, so I...
*sniff*

Being a queen doesn’t mean you can do
everything. Just what you can, right?

Takuma’s right! You gotta do the things only
you can do, Miu.
What I can do...

I don’t know what that is, but...I’ll work
harder to save everyone.

First, we ought to look for any other hurt
guys and save them, right?
I think that’s the best plan, yeah.

Is anyone else hurt around here? I’d better
look a bit more, they’ll need my help!
